NORTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 01.
DISTRESS SIGNAL RECEIVED ON 406 MHZ FROM
9.5 METER S/V ADAYA, WHITE HULL, THREE PERSONS
ON BOARD, IN 12-18.1N 041-53.0W AT 091018Z FEB.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC FORT DE FRANCE,
INMARSAT-C: 422799024, TELEX: 42912008,
PHONE: 5965 9670 9292, FAX: 5965 9663 2450,
E-MAIL: ANTILLES@MRCCFR.EU.
